Make Calls for Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

Learn How to Make CallsView the Calling Script
The dialer for Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez is closes at 9:00PM ET. It re-opens in the morning at 10 AM ET. Sign Up for a Call Shift!

1 Claim Your Login

2 Log into the dialer and call

REMEMBER: You need to turn off your popup blocker to use our Dialer (click on the name of your browser to see the fullsize animation)

Change before you log in: Safari, Edge

Change while you log in: Chrome, Firefox

Calling Hours

We make calls from 10AM - 9PM on Mondaythrough Saturday and 12PM - 9PM on Sunday's in our candidates' local time zones, so check back anytime you want to make calls.

However, your login information will change each day, so you'll need to reclaim it.

Questions

Please email calling@justicedemocrats.com , or use the livechat widget in the bottom of this window. We'll get back to you as soon as we can.
